description: Astronomers have confirmed the most distant black hole ever discovered, lurking in a compact galaxy just 500 million years after the Big Bang. Using the James Webb Space Telescope, the team identified clear spectroscopic evidence of the object, offering new insight into early black hole growth and their role in forming galaxies during the universe’s infancy.
title: Earliest Known Black Hole Found Just 500 Million Years After the Big Bang

description: Astronomers using JWST have spotted a possible gas giant orbiting Alpha Centauri A, only 4 light-years away. If confirmed, it would be the closest exoplanet to a Sun-like star ever imaged. The discovery could challenge current models of planetary formation in binary systems and open new opportunities for studying nearby worlds.
title: James Webb Telescope Detects Potential Gas Giant Exoplanet Just 4 Light-Years Away

description: Platonic Season 2 is a Seth Rogen and Rose Byrne starter that follows a man and a woman exploring their relationship after getting separated due to a rift. The series explores themes of mid life friendship, romance, and relationship. Streaming on Apple TV+.
title: Platonic Season 2 Now Streaming on AppleTV+: Know Everything about Cast, Crew, Plot and more

description: Two friends and their girlfriends head into a forest for a weekend getaway. But a night in the isolated bungalow leads to a horrifying incident. As a girl, when she is left alone in the bungalow, she dies mysteriously, which sets terror and fear in her boyfriend. With no help in sight, fear leads them to make desperate decisions, spiralling into worse and worse results, more than even imagined. The movie will be released on the OTT platform Aha Tamil on August 8.
title: Yaadhum Ariyaan Now Streaming on Aha Tamil: Everything You Need to Know About This Thriller Movie

description: OpenAI’s GPT-5 artificial intelligence (AI) model was added to all interfaces of ChatGPT, including website, desktop, and mobile, on Thursday for all users. Additionally, the company is also releasing the models via application programming interface (API) However, these are not the only interfaces where ChatGPT is available. The chatbot is also integrated with Apple Intelligence and powers several features in the Cupertino-based tech giant’s suite of AI features.
title: Apple Intelligence’s ChatGPT Integration to Reportedly Get Support for GPT-5 Soon

description: Microsoft has cancelled development on Contraband, a co-op title that was in the works at Just Cause maker Avalanche Studios. The news comes a month after Xbox was hit with widespread cuts, that saw several projects cancelled.
title: Xbox Halts Development on Co-Op Game From Just Cause Studio, Kojima's OD Reportedly Still in the Works

description: Apple will be forced to allow browsers that do not function on the WebKit browser engine, under Japan’s Mobile Software Competition Act Guidelines. The country's regulator dubbed the Cupertino company’s practice as anti-competitive as it blocked other browsers to offer the same performance as Safari. This will essentially allow other web browsers and in-app browsers to use other browser engines like Blink and Gecko.
title: Apple Must Allow Alternative Browser Engines on iOS by December Under Japan's New Mobile Software Competition Act

description: Apple topped the IDC's list of worldwide tablet shipments, while Samsung came in second place. According to the International Data Corporation (IDC) Worldwide Quarterly Personal Computing Device Tracker. According to the tracker, worldwide tablet shipment surged 13.1 percent YoY in Q2 this year, reaching 38.3 million units. Amazon and Xiaomi came in the top fourth and fifth positions, respectively.
title: Global Tablet Shipments Surge 13.1 Percent YoY in Q2, Apple Maintains Lead: IDC

description: Panasonic has introduced its 2025 P-Series TV range in India, led by the ShinobiPro MiniLED series inspired by a ninja’s agility and precision. The lineup includes 21 models across MiniLED, 4K Google TV, and Full HD and HD Ready Google TV variants, featuring 4K Studio Colour Engine, Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos support. Prices for the newly launched TVs range from Rs. 17,990 to Rs. 3,99,990, with 65-inch and 75-inch ShinobiPro models priced at Rs. 1,84,990 and Rs. 3,19,990, respectively.
title: Panasonic ShinobiPro MiniLED TVs Launched in India Alongside New 2025 P-Series Models

description: Samsung seems to have started rolling out Gemini voice support for its latest Galaxy Buds 3 lineup, but you can only access it while running One UI 8 based on Android 16. Samsung's newly launched Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 foldable smartphones currently run on One UI 8. The rollout is expected to expand to more Galaxy devices shortly.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 Series Update Adds Google Gemini Support on Phones Running One UI 8

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge was launched in May. However, the specifications of its alleged successor have been surfacing for a while now. Expected to be dubbed Galaxy S26 Edge, the phone is tipped to be thinner than its predecessor, which already boasts its slim design. The battery size of the phone has also been revealed again. Although the new leak still suggests that the handset might come with a higher-capacity battery than its predecessor, it is slightly smaller than what was tipped earlier.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge to Be Thinner than Galaxy S25 Edge Model Despite Larger Battery, Tipster Claims

description: Grok answers and suggestions, in a supposed attempt to increase X’s (formerly Twitter) ad revenue, might show ads in the future. The company’s plans for the same were revealed by Elon Musk during a Spaces discussion with advertisers on the platform. Musk said that till now, the company has been focusing on making Grok better. However, the company wants to now figure out how to meet the expenses for the “expensive” GPUs that power it.
title: Elon Musk's X Plans to Display Ads on Grok Answers; Grok Imagine Temporarily Goes Free for US Users

description: The Infinix GT 30 offers a similar design language to the Pro model. The handset features the Cyber Mecha design with customisable white LED lights. It also has a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED screen with a 144Hz refresh rate. The smartphone is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 processor and features decent cameras on the rear panel. Check out the first impressions to know more about the device.
title: Infinix GT 30 First Impressions
Meet the OnePlus Nord 5: Big on Power, Easy on Your Wallet

description: Meta is reportedly continuing its recruitment offensive to build up its new artificial intelligence (AI) division Superintelligence Labs. As per the report, the Menlo Park-based tech giant’s latest spoils of the war is WaveForms, an AI startup working with audio-focused models. While the terms of the acquisition were not disclosed, the co-founders of the company were reportedly hired by Meta.
title: Meta Reportedly Acquires AI Audio Startup WaveForms Amid Ongoing Talent War

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite has reportedly been spotted on the Google Play Console list with model number SM-X406B.. This implies that the tablet will soon go official. The listing suggests an Exynos 1380 chipset and 6GB of onboard RAM on the tablet. It could ship with Android 15.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Lite Design and Specifications Listed on Google Play Console, Could Debut Soon

description: Asus Vivobook S16 was launched in India on Friday. It is a certified Copilot+ PC and has been refreshed with a Snapdragon X series processor. The laptop’s artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities are supported by a Qualcomm Hexagon NPU which is claimed to deliver up to 45 tera operations per second (TOPS) of AI performance. The Asus Vivobook S16 sports a full HD+ OLED screen with a 60Hz refresh rate. Alongside, the brand also announced the availability of the Asus Chromebook CX15 in India.
title: Asus Vivobook S16 Refreshed in India With Snapdragon X Series Processor: Price, Specifications

description: Players who are logging in to play the first Battlefield 6 open beta in early access are finding the game's servers full. The game reached over 3,30,000 concurrent players on Steam on Thursday. EA said it was working on increase server capacity.
title: Battlefield 6 Open Beta Hits Over 3,30,000 Concurrent Players on Steam With Servers at Full Capacity

description: Google Pixel 10 series is confirmed to launch on August 20 at the annual Made by Google event. The tech giant has already put out teaser videos for the new lineup. As we get closer to the launch date, the Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro Fold, and Pixel Watch 4 have surfaced online in alleged promotional videos.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold, Pixel 10 Pro and Watch 4 Designs Revealed via Marketing Videos

description: Google’s artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot Gemini was recently spotted making self-loathing comments. These comments, where it called itself a failure and a disgrace, were typically made after the chatbot failed to complete a complex task despite making multiple attempts to do so. This strange behaviour caught the eye of several netizens who posted about this on social media platforms.
title: Google Working to Fix Gemini Bug That Made It Call Itself a Failure

description: iPhone 17 Pro may start at 256GB storage, dropping the 128GB option, with a $50 (approx. Rs. 4,400) higher base price than its predecessor. The iPhone 16 Pro is available in 128 GB, 256GB, 51GB and 1TB options. The iPhone 17 Pro is expected to include an A19 Pro chip, 12GB RAM, a vapour chamber cooling, a scratch-resistant anti-reflective display coating, and a 48-megapixel telephoto camera with up to 8x optical zoom. The iPhone 17 series is expected to launch on September 9.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Tipped to Feature 256GB of Storage on Base Model Like iPhone 17 Pro Max

description: iQOO launched the TWS Air 3 Pro in China alongside the iQOO Z10 Turbo+ 5G. Priced at CNY 199 (roughly Rs. 2,400), the earbuds feature 12mm drivers, up to 50dB ANC, and up to 47 hours of battery life with the case. They come in Star Diamond White and Star Yellow, with a discounted CNY 159 (roughly Rs. 1,900) price when bundled with the Z10 Turbo+. iQOO also introduced a 22.5W 10,000mAh power bank with an in-built cable.
title: iQOO TWS Air 3 Pro With Up to 50dB Adaptive ANC Launched Alongside iQOO 22.5W 10,000mAh Power Bank

description: Redmi is said to be working on a handset, which could ship with an 8,500mAh to 9,000mAh battery. This comes weeks after a report suggested that another Chinese tech company is developing a smartphone that would pack a 10,000mAh battery. Advancements in battery development methods, along with the arrival of the silicon-carbon technology, have helped companies pack higher-capacity batteries without increasing the thickness of handsets.
title: Xiaomi Working on Redmi Smartphone With Up to 9,000mAh Battery, Tipster Claims

description: YouTube is now preparing to roll out its artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) age estimation tool. Announced in July, this tool uses several user activity metrics to determine the real age of the user. The streaming giant says this feature will better protect minors who have provided fake dates of birth while making their accounts.
title: YouTube’s AI Age Estimation Model to Begin Rolling Out Next Week, Will Add Restrictions to Minor Accounts

description: Apple MacBook Pro with the M6 chip will reportedly use OLED displays made by Samsung. The tech giant is expected to launch the laptops with its M5 chipsets in early 2026. However, the models with OLED displays and M6 chips could be unveiled in late 2026. The tech giant is already expected to launch several new devices early next year, including new iPad, MacBook Air, and MacBook Pro variants.
title: Apple MacBook Pro With M6 Chip, Samsung OLED Displays to Debut in Late 2026: Report

description: OpenAI finally released its next-generation frontier artificial intelligence (AI) model, GPT-5, on Thursday. The new model comes with improvements across different parameters. However, one specific area where it displays a significant upgrade is health-related queries. The San Francisco-based tech giant says unlike previous models by the company, the latest large language model (LLM) can act as an active thought partner, asking questions to understand the situation better and flagging potential concerns.
title: OpenAI Says GPT-5 Its Best Model for Health-Related Queries, Outperforms Other Models in HealthBench

description: Realme on Friday teased the launch of a new smartphone in India via an e-commerce platform. While most details remain under wraps, it is confirmed to be part of the brand’s P series. In a separate development, an unnamed Realme handset was spotted on a benchmarking platform and it is speculated to be the Realme P4 Pro 5G. By piecing the clues together, it is highly probable that Realme could be teasing the launch of the aforementioned handset.
title: Realme P4 Series Teased to Launch in India Soon; Could Debut With Realme P4 Pro 5G

description: A reliable tipster has confirmed the release date for ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X handhelds. The two Xbox-branded handhelds will reportedly launch in October. Pre-orders for the devices are expected to go live later this month at Gamescom.
title: ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X Will Reportedly Launch in October

description: Samsung is rolling out a new feature to address the threat of AI-powered voice phishing attacks. The South Korean brand has announced a ‘Voice Phishing Suspected Call Alert’ feature in One UI 8. The new functionality is available in South Korea only for now.
title: Samsung Unveils AI-Driven Voice Phishing Scam Detection on One UI 8 Smartphones

description: The Infinix GT 30 5G+ features a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED display with Gorilla Glass 7i protection. Powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chip, it runs Android 15 with two OS upgrades promised. Gaming highlights include GT Shoulder Triggers, 90fps BGMI support, XBoost AI, and vapour chamber cooling. It sports a 64-megapixel dual rear camera setup, a Cyber Mecha Design 2.0 with LEDs, and a 5,500mAh battery with 45W fast charging and bypass charging support.
title: Infinix GT 30 5G+ Launched in India With 64-Megapixel Rear Camera, GT Shoulder Triggers: Price, Specifications

description: Infinix Hot 60i 5G will be available to interested buyers in India soon via Flipkart. The handset will come with a horizontal rear camera module, which will house a dual camera setup along with an LED flash. It is confirmed to be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6400 chipset. The Chinese smartphone manufacturer will offer its new phone in four colour options.
title: Infinix Hot 60i 5G India Launch Confirmed; Will Debut With Dimensity 6400 SoC, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera

description: Redmi 15 5G is expected to go official in select markets soon. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the handset has been listed on the brand’s website in Malaysia and Singapore. It is confirmed to be available in three colourways, including a Ripple Green shade which features a textured back panel. In both markets, the upcoming Redmi 15 5G is said to be offered in a single RAM and storage configuration.
title: Redmi 15 5G Price, Colour Options Listed on Website Ahead of Launch in Malaysia and Singapore

description: Sony Group CFO Sue Lin called the Xperia brand a "very important business" during Thursday’s financial results briefing, affirming plans to continue its smartphone focus alongside other communication technologies. Her remarks came after a major Xperia 1 VII glitch, causing shutdowns, random reboots, or power failures, which prompted a sales halt and free replacement program. Despite market stagnation, especially in Japan, and no other handset launches this year sparking exit speculation, her statement suggests Sony will keep producing smartphones, with more Xperia models expected.
title: Sony CFO Calls Xperia Brand 'Very Important' Part of Business Amidst Ongoing Challenges

description: Honor is yet to announce an official launch date for the Honor 400 Smart 5G, but ahead of it, the handset was spotted on a Spanish telecom operator's website. The listing reveals the design and specifications of the phone. It is listed with a 6.77-inch display, Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 SoC and a 6,500mAh battery.
title: Honor 400 Smart 5G Design, Specifications Surface on Telecom Operator's Site Ahead of Imminent Debut

description: Mira Murati’s name made headlines in November 2023, when she briefly served as interim CEO of OpenAI following Sam Altman’s removal by the board. However, this lasted merely three days as she was replaced by Emmett Shear, who himself was removed when Altman was reinstated five days later. Murati was once again made the CTO of the company.
title: Who Is Mira Murati: The AI Startup CEO Who Withstood Meta’s Billion-Dollar Recruitment Offensive

description: Samsung recently announced the expansion of its One UI 8 Beta programme to include more handsets. However, the company stopped short of revealing the exact timeline of the firmware’s rollout. The information has now surfaced, courtesy of a tipster. The One UI 8 Beta for the Samsung Galaxy S24 series is tipped to be released beginning next week. Meanwhile, Galaxy S23 series users might be able to experience the beta update in September.
title: One UI 8 Beta for Samsung Galaxy S24 Tipped to Roll Out on August 13; Galaxy S23 Beta to Follow Soon

description: OpenAI on Thursday released its latest family of frontier artificial intelligence (AI) models. Named GPT-5, it is said to offer a significant improvement in performance across coding, health, match, visual perception, and health. As per the San Francisco-based firm, customers can select between four types of AI models— GPT-5, GPT-5 Mini, GPT-5 Nano, and GPT-5 Pro, with different pricing based on the number of tokens used.
title: OpenAI Announces GPT-5 Family of Frontier AI Models With Improved Performance in Coding, Health, and Writing

description: Infinix GT 30 5G+ is all set to be launched in India today (August 8). The handset will join the Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G in the company’s lineup which was introduced in June. Here is all you need to know about the Infinix GT 30 5G+ ahead of its launch in India today at 12pm IST.
title: Infinix GT 30 5G+ Launching Today: Know Price, Features, Specifications and More

description: With the first half of August heating up, OTT platforms are delivering premium content across genres. Wednesday Season 2 brings supernatural teen drama back to Netflix while Mickey 17 offers philosophical sci-fi on Hotstar. Indian viewers can dive into epic tales like Mayasabha and Arabia Kadali, or enjoy grounded gems like Salakaar and Maaman.
title: OTT Releases This Week (August 04 - August 10): Wednesday Season 2, Salaakar, Mickey 17, Mayasabha, and More
